meanings.definition: Characterized by lack of order or planning; random.
meanings.sent1: The haphazard arrangement of the books on the shelf made it difficult to find anything.
meanings.sent2: The haphazard way the toys were scattered across the room showed that a child had been playing there.
meanings.sent3: The haphazard jumble of colors in the painting gave it a unique and quirky charm.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a haphazard puzzle, scattered and disconnected.
meanings.sent5: The haphazard pattern of stars in the sky seemed to form a secret message.

meanings.sent1: The haphazard meeting with an old friend at the store brought back fond memories.
meanings.sent2: The haphazard discovery of the hidden treasure amazed the explorers.
meanings.sent3: His haphazard luck with finding four-leaf clovers made his friends think he was magical.
meanings.sent4: The haphazard alignment of events led to an unexpected outcome.
meanings.sent5: The haphazard way the pieces fell together made it seem like fate was at play.
